title: Navaratna Karna Kundala: Auspicious Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Classic circular design featuring the auspicious Navaratna gemstones in a traditional arrangement. Delicate filigree gold work forms the outer ring, interspersed with sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The gemstones are bezel-set for security and a smooth finish. The detailed gold work showcases traditional South Indian artistry.
colors: grey). The contrasting colors of the Navaratnas are designed to enhance their individual brilliance.
occasions: or any auspicious occasion. Adds a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Ideal for Gifting during special ceremonies.
description: These Karna Kundala embody traditional South Indian jewelry design and symbolism. The Navaratnas are believed to bring prosperity, health, and good fortune to the wearer. Expert craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and durability. The combination of traditional design and modern sparkle makes it a timeless piece.
